body: popix ===== Popix (Popular Pix) is a mobile photo sharing application. Demo: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TworTztXB5s Authors: Richard Brookfield & Jason Campbell ### Welcome to POPIX "Popular Pictures". POPIX is a picture sharing application that allows users to send pictures to all other active users. Users can vote on pictures and explore their friends pictures. **Built on top of NodeJS, Phonegap and JQM** Here are some example screens for the project in its current state... ### Connect Using Your social Networks ### Photo Streams ### Simple Facebook like navigation ### Take Images ### Tag them ### Share Them ### Post To Facebook
name: Popix
